archimate:Requirement.name: BC.1.3.1: Critical business processes should be supported by business applications and technical infrastructure (e.g. systems, networks or voice facilities) that use robust, reliable hardware and software, and are supported by alternative or duplicate facilities.
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
